verbs.description: Disaster ! Sell - out ! [ARG1: The verdicts on Trump ’s summit with Kim Jong - un] [V: surged] [ARGM-DIR: in] – [ARGM-ADV: many of them scornful and hostile] . Tthe same people would have been saying the opposite if it had been Obama .
